name: Web Development
description: Building responsive and interactive web applications using modern front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Database Design
description: Designing and implementing efficient database structures, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity.

name: Server-Side Development
description: Developing server-side logic and APIs using frameworks like Node.js, Python, or Ruby on Rails.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Creating cross-platform or native mobile applications for iOS and Android devices using frameworks like React Native or Flutter.

name: DevOps
description: Setting up and maintaining the infrastructure, continuous integration/delivery, and automating deployment processes.

name: Version Control
description: Using version control systems like Git to manage code repositories, track changes, and collaborate efficiently.
